verses.verse: In the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the son<WH1121> of Ahasuerus,<WH325> of the seed<WH2233> of the Medes,<WH4074> which<WH834> was made king<WH4427> over<WH5921> the realm<WH4438> of the Chaldeans;<WH3778>

In the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of his reign<WH4427> I Daniel<WH1840> understood<WH995> by books<WH5612> the number<WH4557> of the years,<WH8141> whereof<WH834> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet,<WH5030> that he would accomplish<WH4390> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141> in the desolations<WH2723> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And I set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> to the Lord<WH136> God,<WH430> to seek<WH1245> by prayer<WH8605> and supplications,<WH8469> with fasting,<WH6685> and sackcloth,<WH8242> and ashes:<WH665>

And I prayed<WH6419> to the LORD<WH3068> my God,<WH430> and made my confession,<WH3034> and said,<WH559> O Lord,<WH136> the great<WH1419> and dreadful<WH3372> God,<WH410> keeping<WH8104> the covenant<WH1285> and mercy<WH2617> to them that love<WH157> him, and to them that keep<WH8104> his commandments;<WH4687>

We have sinned,<WH2398> and have committed<WH5753> iniquity,<WH5753> and have done wickedly,<WH7561> and have rebelled,<WH4775> even by departing<WH5493> from your precepts<WH4687> and from your judgments:<WH4941>

Neither<WH3808> have we listened<WH8085> to your servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> which<WH834> spoke<WH1696> in your name<WH8034> to our kings,<WH4428> our princes,<WH8269> and our fathers,<WH1> and to all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> of the land.<WH776>

O LORD,<WH136> righteousness<WH6666> belongs to you, but to us confusion<WH1322> of faces,<WH6440> as at this<WH2088> day;<WH3117> to the men<WH376> of Judah,<WH3063> and to the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and to all<WH3605> Israel,<WH3478> that are near,<WH7138> and that are far<WH7350> off, through all<WH3605> the countries<WH776> where<WH834> <WH8033> you have driven<WH5080> them, because of their trespass<WH4604> that they have trespassed<WH4603> against you.
O Lord,<WH136> to us belongs confusion<WH1322> of face,<WH6440> to our kings,<WH4428> to our princes,<WH8269> and to our fathers,<WH1> because<WH834> we have sinned<WH2398> against you.
To the Lord<WH136> our God<WH430> belong mercies<WH7356> and forgivenesses,<WH5547> though<WH3588> we have rebelled<WH4775> against him;

Neither<WH3808> have we obeyed<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> to walk<WH3212> in his laws,<WH8451> which<WH834> he set<WH5414> before<WH6440> us by his servants<WH5650> the prophets.<WH5030>

Yes, all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> have transgressed<WH5674> your law,<WH8451> even by departing,<WH5493> that they might not obey<WH8085> your voice;<WH6963> therefore the curse<WH423> is poured<WH5413> on us, and the oath<WH7621> that is written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of God,<WH430> because<WH3588> we have sinned<WH2398> against him.

And he has confirmed<WH6965> his words,<WH1697> which<WH834> he spoke<WH1696> against<WH5921> us, and against<WH5921> our judges<WH8199> that judged<WH8199> us, by bringing<WH935> on us a great<WH1419> evil:<WH7451> for under<WH8478> the whole<WH3605> heaven<WH8064> has not been done<WH6213> as has been done<WH6213> on Jerusalem.<WH3389>

As it is written<WH3789> in the law<WH8451> of Moses,<WH4872> all<WH3605> this<WH2063> evil<WH7451> is come<WH935> on us: yet made we not our prayer<WH2470> before<WH854> <WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> our God,<WH430> that we might turn<WH7725> from our iniquities,<WH5771> and understand<WH7919> your truth.<WH571>

Therefore has the LORD<WH3068> watched<WH8245> on the evil,<WH7451> and brought<WH935> it on us: for the LORD<WH3068> our God<WH430> is righteous<WH6662> in all<WH3605> his works<WH4639> which<WH834> he does:<WH6213> for we obeyed<WH8085> not his voice.<WH6963>

And now,<WH6258> O Lord<WH136> our God,<WH430> that have brought<WH3318> your people<WH5971> forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with a mighty<WH2389> hand,<WH3027> and have gotten<WH6213> you renown,<WH8034> as at this day;<WH3117> we have sinned,<WH2398> we have done wickedly.<WH7561>

O LORD,<WH136> according to all<WH3605> your righteousness,<WH6666> I beseech<WH4994> you, let your anger<WH639> and your fury<WH2534> be turned<WH7725> away from your city<WH5892> Jerusalem,<WH3389> your holy<WH6944> mountain:<WH2022> because<WH3588> for our sins,<WH2399> and for the iniquities<WH5771> of our fathers,<WH1> Jerusalem<WH3389> and your people<WH5971> are become a reproach<WH2781> to all<WH3605> that are about<WH5439> us.

Now<WH6258> therefore, O our God,<WH430> hear<WH8085> the prayer<WH8605> of your servant,<WH5650> and his supplications,<WH8469> and cause your face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> on your sanctuary<WH4720> that is desolate,<WH8074> for the Lord's<WH136> sake.<WH4616>

O my God,<WH430> incline<WH5186> your ear,<WH241> and hear;<WH8085> open<WH6491> your eyes,<WH5869> and behold<WH7200> our desolations,<WH8074> and the city<WH5892> which<WH834> is called<WH7121> by your name:<WH8034> for we do not present<WH5307> our supplications<WH8469> before<WH6440> you for our righteousnesses,<WH6666> but for your great<WH7227> mercies.<WH7356>

O Lord,<WH136> hear;<WH8085> O Lord,<WH136> forgive;<WH5545> O Lord,<WH136> listen<WH7181> and do;<WH6213> defer<WH309> not, for your own sake,<WH4616> O my God:<WH430> for your city<WH5892> and your people<WH5971> are called<WH7121> by your name.<WH8034>

And whiles<WH5750> I was speaking,<WH1696> and praying,<WH6419> and confessing<WH3034> my sin<WH2403> and the sin<WH2403> of my people<WH5971> Israel,<WH3478> and presenting<WH5307> my supplication<WH8467> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> my God<WH430> for the holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022> of my God;<WH430>

Yes, whiles<WH5750> I was speaking<WH1696> in prayer,<WH8605> even the man<WH376> Gabriel,<WH1403> whom<WH834> I had seen<WH7200> in the vision<WH2377> at the beginning,<WH8462> being caused to fly<WH3286> swiftly,<WH3288> touched<WH5060> me about the time<WH6256> of the evening<WH6153> oblation.<WH4503>
And he informed<WH995> me, and talked<WH1696> with me, and said,<WH559> O Daniel,<WH1840> I am now<WH6258> come<WH3318> forth<WH3318> to give you skill<WH7919> and understanding.<WH998>

At the beginning<WH8462> of your supplications<WH8469> the commandment<WH1697> came<WH3318> forth,<WH3318> and I am come<WH935> to show<WH5046> you; for you are greatly beloved:<WH2530> therefore understand<WH995> the matter,<WH1697> and consider<WH995> the vision.<WH2377>

Seventy<WH7657> weeks<WH7620> are determined<WH2852> on your people<WH5971> and on your holy<WH6944> city,<WH5892> to finish<WH3607> the transgression,<WH6588> and to make an end<WH2856> of sins,<WH2403> and to make reconciliation<WH3722> for iniquity,<WH5771> and to bring<WH935> in everlasting<WH5769> righteousness,<WH6664> and to seal<WH2856> up the vision<WH2377> and prophecy,<WH5030> and to anoint<WH4886> the most<WH6944> Holy.<WH6944>

Know<WH3045> therefore and understand,<WH7919> that from the going<WH4161> forth<WH4161> of the commandment<WH1697> to restore<WH7725> and to build<WH1129> Jerusalem<WH3389> to the Messiah<WH4899> the Prince<WH5057> shall be seven<WH7651> weeks,<WH7620> and three score<WH8346> and two<WH8147> weeks:<WH7620> the street<WH7339> shall be built<WH1129> again,<WH7725> and the wall,<WH2742> even in troublous<WH5916> times.<WH6256>

And after<WH310> three score<WH8346> and two<WH8147> weeks<WH7620> shall Messiah<WH4899> be cut<WH3772> off, but not for himself: and the people<WH5971> of the prince<WH5057> that shall come<WH935> shall destroy<WH7843> the city<WH5892> and the sanctuary;<WH6944> and the end<WH7093> thereof shall be with a flood,<WH7858> and to the end<WH7093> of the war<WH4421> desolations<WH8074> are determined.<WH2782>

And he shall confirm<WH1396> the covenant<WH1285> with many<WH7227> for one<WH259> week:<WH7620> and in the middle<WH2677> of the week<WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice<WH2077> and the oblation<WH4503> to cease,<WH7673> and for the overspreading<WH3671> of abominations<WH8251> he shall make it desolate,<WH8074> even until<WH5704> the consummation,<WH3617> and that determined<WH2782> shall be poured<WH5413> on the desolate.<WH8076>
